column4: I followed the breezy installation method of firefox 1.5 and installed it in breezy now I'm in dapper and want to use dapper repository and to keep my firefox extensions and etc. how do i do this?
no it will not the firefox is installed int he /opt
and my extensions are probebly too
Just switch over to the dapper version, there is nothing you need to do but switch the command for the default browser
